message: Fair 60-40 split. Accept and let's be done!
Your split seems a bit unfair to me. How about a 55/45 split in your favor?
Meet in the middle of our previous offers. This is as low as I'm willing to go!
Okay Alice, let's compromise. This is closer to your offer, but still acknowledges my initial proposal.
Tiny concession. This is as close to 50/50 as I'm willing to go. Inflation is killing us!
Alice, we're running out of time!  My offer is more than fair considering the inflation. Let's settle this now before we both lose out.
